name: Call of Colors
description:
Welcome to the amazing world of Colors!

A beautifully enchanted wild kingdom is waiting to be explored by you. In Call of Colors, we begin our journey as the Last Shaman, spreading magic through a desolate world and bringing it’s lost colors back to life.

Call of Colors is not just a simple coloring book or just a funny coloring game. It’s a free adventure puzzle-painting and hidden object game for casual gamers with an unforgettable story!

Swipe to rotate, pinch to zoom in/out, tap to color until the mysterious puzzle is solved and the world is colorful and awakened again.

Dive into a whole new 3D puzzle experience and enjoy unique gameplay.

Features:
* Explore amazingly beautiful 3D scenesSatisfying tap sounds (ASMR)
* Enjoy unique theme musics of levels
* Calm your mind through beautiful art
* Find hidden objects and earn diamonds
* Unlock interactive comic books
* Explore an intriguing narrative with a diverse cast of magical characters
* OUT OF ENERGY? You can calm yourself with animated breathing exercises while you progress through the game
* New content added regularly.

Ready? Let's get on this journey together!
